successes.title: Escape Big Box
successes.description: Escape is a real time cooperative board game in which players must escape from a cursed temple before the temple collapses.

Pledges.description: This pledge level is for backers in the US, Canada and EU who are only interested in the bonus material and not the base game or expansions. This pledge level contains all the mini expansions (the Pit, Doomed, and the Fountain), the bonus module (Mayan Calendar), and all the stretch rewards we reach EXCEPT MAMMUT. This pledge level does not include the Mammut stretch reward or the Big Box Escape. A $5 shipping fee is included in the pledge amount. NO SHIPPING NEEDS TO BE ADDED.

This pledge level is for backers in countries not listed/covered in the $38 pledge level who are only interested in the bonus material and not the base game or expansions. This pledge level contains all the mini expansions (the Pit, Doomed, and the Fountain), the bonus module (Mayan Calendar), and all the stretch rewards we reach EXCEPT MAMMUT. This pledge level does not include the Mammut stretch reward or the Big Box Escape. A $17 shipping fee is included in the pledge amount. NO SHIPPING NEEDS TO BE ADDED. Please note that we are not able to ship to Brazil at this time.

EARLY BIRD. You will receive a copy of Escape Big Box at a special "early bird" price! You will also receive any stretch rewards we reach. Includes shipping to the United States, Germany,Belgium, and Netherlands. All other countries check the "Shipping" section of the project description to determine your shipping fee. We accept no variations to this pledge level.

24 hour "flash" sale (ends Sunday April 20th at 1PM US central time)! You will receive a copy of Escape Big Box at the special flash price! You will also receive any stretch rewards we reach. Includes shipping to the United States, Germany,Belgium, and Netherlands. All other countries check the "Shipping" section of the project description to determine your shipping fee. We accept no variations to this pledge level.

48+ hour "flash" sale (ends Sunday April 27th at 10PM US central time)! You will receive a copy of Escape Big Box at the special flash price! You will also receive any stretch rewards we reach. Includes shipping to the United States, Germany,Belgium, and Netherlands. All other countries check the "Shipping" section of the project description to determine your shipping fee. We accept no variations to this pledge level.

We accept no variations to this pledge level.
